titleStmt.title: Remedium melancholiae, or, The remedy of melancholy. the first book being a choice collection of new songs : with a thorow-bass for the harpsichord, theorbo, or bass-viol. / composed by Johann Wolfgang Franck.
titleStmt.author: Franck, Johann Wolfgang, ca. 1644-ca. 1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Heptinstall and are to be sold by the author, living at Mr. Bond's, a barber in Lothbury,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, with loss of some page numbers.
Reproduction of original in: Library of Congress.
